title: Spend and prosper: a portrait of John Maynard Keynes

description: Episode of Series "Horizon". Traces the life of John Maynard Keynes through the eyes of some of the people who knew and worked with him. They include Quentin Bell, J.K. Galbraith and Ninette de Valois. Also spells out some of his economic theories which are in direct opposition to the monetarist policies followed by today's (1980's) governments. Narrated by Paul Vaughan.
